# PLAYER::SPECIAL_ABILITY_FILL_METER

## Summary
Fills the player special ability meter

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **BOOL** ignoreActive
* **INT** abilitySlot = 0

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Also known as _RECHARGE_SPECIAL_ABILITY
